objects.specification: The floor is a large horizontal plane with a warm wooden tone and a realistic polished hardwood texture composed of parallel planks with subtle grain patterns and slight color variations. It features a gently glossy finish that softly reflects ambient lighting, enhancing the sense of space and warmth. The edges meet the surrounding walls seamlessly to form a continuous, inviting surface that grounds the room with natural character.

This front wall is a tall vertical surface clad in smooth plaster with a uniform light cream paint and a matte finish. It provides a clean and neutral backdrop for mounted items, with crisp edges and an even texture free of visible seams. The style is minimalistic and bright, designed to complement the room’s warm wooden floor and furniture tones.

This back wall mirrors the front in style, featuring a smooth plaster surface painted in light cream with a flat matte finish. It offers a clean canvas for decorations and functional elements, with sharp edges and a seamless appearance. The neutral aesthetic ensures visual continuity around the perimeter of the room.

The left wall is constructed of smooth plaster with a consistent light cream matte paint. It serves as a neutral boundary to the classroom, offering a continuous, uncluttered surface ideal for windows and mounted decor. The clean design enhances the sense of openness and brightness.

The right wall is a smooth plaster surface painted in light cream with a matte finish and clean edges. It provides a uniform, uncluttered backdrop for furniture and decor, contributing to the room’s cohesive and airy feel. The minimalistic design emphasizes brightness and space.

The doorway features a simple rectangular door panel with a light natural wood grain texture and subtle vertical grooves. It is framed by matching wood trim with a slightly darker tone, and includes a slim brushed metal handle. The finish is matte, providing a functional and unobtrusive entryway that blends seamlessly with the wall.

This teacher’s desk is a large rectangular piece crafted from dark-stained wood featuring pronounced grain patterns. The top surface is smoothly lacquered with gently beveled edges, resting on stout square legs for a commanding presence. Subtle metallic hardware accents lend an executive and refined character to the design.

The teacher’s chair is an ergonomic design upholstered in soft blue fabric with subtle stitching details. It features a contoured backrest and seat cushion supported by a polished black metal frame, with a five-point base concealed beneath the seat. The chair balances comfort and professionalism with clean lines and a muted color palette.

The blackboard is a large rectangular panel with a deep matte black writing surface optimized for chalk legibility. It is encased in a slim dark gray metal frame with flush-mounted brackets for a discreet appearance. The slightly textured finish minimizes glare and provides a tactile surface for clear chalk markings.

The ceiling-mounted projector has a compact white plastic housing with softly rounded corners and a central lens protruding slightly from the front. Ventilation slots are neatly integrated along the sides, and the matte finish blends unobtrusively with the ceiling. The device is designed for simplicity and functionality, with minimal decorative elements.

This tall bookshelf is constructed from medium-toned wood with prominent vertical grain and a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is populated with a diverse assortment of colorful books, creating visual interest and a lived-in feel. The frame features clean straight lines and a minimalist design, emphasizing symmetry against the wall.

This tall bookshelf is constructed from medium-toned wood with prominent vertical grain and a smooth matte finish. Each shelf is populated with a diverse assortment of colorful books, creating visual interest and a lived-in feel. The frame features clean straight lines and a minimalist design, emphasizing symmetry against the wall.

The window is a large rectangular opening fitted with clear glass panes in a slender off-white frame. It is dressed with soft cream-colored curtains made of lightweight fabric, hanging in gentle, natural folds from a discreet curtain rod. The combination allows natural light to filter softly into the room while adding a touch of warmth and texture.

The poster is a matte-printed educational graphic featuring vibrant diagrams, informative text, and colorful illustrations related to academic topics. It is mounted in a thin light wood frame with a subtle painted finish that complements the wall color. The surface has a slight texture to reduce glare and enhance readability.

It is mounted in a thin light wood frame with a subtle painted finish that complements the wall color. The surface has a slight texture to reduce glare and enhance readability.

The wall clock is a circular timepiece with a crisp white face, bold black numerals, and slender black hands. It is encircled by a slim brushed silver metallic frame with a clear glass cover that sits flush with the frame. The design is clean, functional, and highly legible, serving as both a decorative and practical element.

This potted plant features lush green foliage with natural variegation and gently curved leaves. The leaves emerge from a simple terracotta pot with a matte finish, sitting on a small matching saucer. The organic form and vibrant color add a refreshing decorative accent to the corner of the room.

This waste bin is a small cylindrical container made from smooth gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile. It features a thin rolled rim at the top and a matte finish for a modern, utilitarian look. The design is compact and unobtrusive, suitable for everyday disposal needs.

This waste bin is a small cylindrical container made from smooth gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile. It features a thin rolled rim at the top and a matte finish for a modern, utilitarian look. The design is compact and unobtrusive, suitable for everyday disposal needs.

This ceiling light is a square flush-mounted fixture with a frosted glass diffuser and a slim off-white metal frame. It emits soft, even ambient lighting and has a minimalist profile close to the ceiling. The contemporary design ensures efficient illumination while remaining visually discreet.

This ceiling light is a square flush-mounted fixture with a frosted glass diffuser and a slim off-white metal frame. It emits soft, even ambient lighting and has a minimalist profile close to the ceiling. The contemporary design ensures efficient illumination while remaining visually discreet.

The student desk is a compact rectangular table with a light wood tone top featuring subtle grain patterns and gently rounded corners. It is supported by slender black metal legs with a matte finish, and includes a small open shelf beneath the surface for storing books. The finish is smooth and durable, combining functionality with a clean modern aesthetic.

The student chair features a molded plastic seat and backrest in a soft light blue color with a subtly textured surface for grip. It rests on four slender black metal legs with a powder-coated matte finish, providing sturdy support. The seat has gentle ergonomic contours and a minimalist aesthetic that pairs seamlessly with the desks.
